original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3496)@</color>蓄積電能，對前方的敵人施放3波雷電攻擊，每波雷電以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3496)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>與<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3496)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>造成傷害，同時降低敵人的攻擊速度。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3496)@</color> accumulate electric energy, and cast 3 waves of lightning attacks on enemies in front, each wave of lightning is <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3496)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> and <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(3496)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color>Inflicts damage while reducing the enemy's attack speed.
